data.oai_dc:dc: Cervus infile for seeds collected in 1998 at the undisturbed plot

Genotypes of 10 microsatellite markers. Lines 2 to 145 were genotypes of adult trees (more than 20 cm dbh) in the undisturbed plot (6.0 ha). Genotypes of seeds collected from four mother trees were started from Line 145.
dipterocarps|mating system|pollen dispersal|inbreeding depression|fecundity|partial self-incompatibility|reproductive assurance|selective abortion|tropical rain forest
